name: Clam and Mushroom Chowder
keywords: cherrystone clams, clam juice, mushroom, main course
recipeIngredient: 1 cup finely diced peeled boiling potatoes
1/2 cup fish stock or clam juice
1 1/2 cup chopped cherrystone or chowder clams
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place the mushrooms, shallots and butter in a heavy saucepan. Cover and cook over low heat until the mushrooms are tender, about 10 minutes.

Add the potatoes, stock and white wine. Simmer, covered, until the potatoes are very soft, about 30 minutes. Add the clams and half-and-half and simmer uncovered, stirring from time to time, about 10 minutes longer.
Season to taste with salt and pepper and serve.
